stockpile.barrel.just_locked: Locked: this barrel will only accept the current item, even when empty.
stockpile.barrel.just_unlocked: Unlocked: this barrel will accept any item when empty.
block.stockpile.trash_can.description: Destroys thrown items! Right-click to open/close
block.stockpile.void_barrel.description: Destroys items inserted past max capacity
block.stockpile.input_barrel.description: Allows inserting to a bank of contiguous barrels
block.stockpile.output_barrel.descriptio: Allows extracting from a bank of contiguous barrels
block.stockpile.barrel_connector.descrip: Connects barrels so they are considered contiguous
